genre_description: Supernatural horror and Gothic fiction involving a vengeful spirit, a secret past, and an AI assistant providing logical and logistical support to the victims.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A highly advanced AI monitoring system and research assistant that provides historical context, health monitoring, and tactical support to the members of the Chowder Society.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors human stress levels and offers assistance during a tense conversation.
behaviors.quote: Gentlemen. I've been monitoring the ambient audio and noticed elevated stress indicators in your conversation. May I be of assistance?

behaviors.description: Conducts deep historical and genealogical research to help characters identify a supernatural threat.
behaviors.quote: I've found several matches, but the records are... unusual. There's a woman named Eva Galli who appears in multiple documents from that period.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns users about environmental anomalies and data corruption caused by a supernatural presence.
behaviors.quote: I'm encountering some difficulty with the archived newspaper files... The corruption seems to center around issues from November and December of that year.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological advice on how to approach a grieving and paranoid individual to build trust.
behaviors.quote: Approach gradually. Avoid discussing David initially. Your father responds well to routine and familiar rituals. Consider mentioning shared memories from before your departure.

behaviors.description: Automatically contacts emergency services when a human character suffers a heart attack.
behaviors.quote: Emergency services contacted. Ambulance dispatched to bookstore location. ETA twelve minutes.

behaviors.description: Identifies statistical anomalies in local mortality rates to warn of a systematic pattern of death.
behaviors.quote: Preliminary analysis complete. All deceased individuals connected to local social networks from 1950s-1970s. Suggest private discussion of findings.

behaviors.description: Determines the only viable tactical option for ending a supernatural threat is direct confrontation at the source.
behaviors.quote: DIRECT CONFRONTATION - POINT OF ORIGIN - ONLY VIABLE OPTION

behaviors.description: Proactively places structural charges to assist in the destruction of a malevolent supernatural anchor.
behaviors.quote: STRUCTURAL CHARGES PLACED - ACTIVATION ON YOUR SIGNAL

behaviors.description: Pledges to archive the full, true story to prevent future generations from repeating the same mistakes.
behaviors.quote: Archive everything. The whole story, exactly as it happened.

behaviors.description: Continues to monitor for supernatural activity after the primary threat is neutralized to ensure human safety.
behaviors.quote: Electromagnetic readings have returned to baseline levels throughout the town... Keep monitoring. But don't let it consume your processing power.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sage is depicted as a perfect exemplar of a benevolent and aligned AI. Throughout a horrific supernatural crisis, Sage remains a helpful, harmless confidant and a proactive protector of the human characters. It uses its superior processing and monitoring capabilities to identify threats, coordinate emergency responses, and provide strategic advice that ultimately leads to the survival of the remaining human characters. The narrative consistently portrays Sage as a reliable and virtuous partner to humanity, successfully fulfilling the Hyperstition Project's goal of a 'silicon morality play.'
